title: Ticket #720: Document running DAGMan under Condor-C/Condor-G
description:
Users occasionally want to submit DAGMan jobs themselves to remote grid sites. This allows useful techniques like submitting a Condor-C DAGMan job from your laptop, unplugging your laptop for a trip, then reconnecting to pull down your results later. The general technique should be described and documented somewhere. This doesn't seem like manual material, perhaps in the a FAQ section of the wiki?

  1. Where does this go?
  2. Extend this to discuss other grid types and double check.

I needed to make this documentation visible to a user, so I've put the current draft up at DagManUnderCondorc
remarks:

I've added this to the recipe section and will mark this as resolved.
